statements: DELETE FROM Accommodations WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM accommodation WHERE id = 5 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM environmental_impact WHERE accommodation_id = 10 AND carbon_footprint > 50 AND electricity_usage < 100;
DELETE FROM environmental_impact WHERE water_usage > 100 AND energy_consumption < 50;
DELETE FROM waste_management WHERE accommodation_id = 3 AND recycling = true;
DELETE FROM services WHERE price > 100 AND service_name LIKE '%suite%';
